Name: Welcome Back To 2007 2
About the game: Would you say that 2007 cannot be returned? But after 11 long years, 2007 is coming back to us. AGAIN! Welcome Back To 2007 2, is an old-school platformer game. Features: ■ Jetpack working on a real physical model; ■ Different skins of the main Hero; ■ Lots of new Enemies, Locations and SPAAAACE; ■ Cool Story Mode; ■ Original soundtrack by Anacom; ■ Very cool Bosses, we didn't even spoil them in the trailer; ■ Spring 2020 added Easy difficulty & many Checkpoints; ■ For Hard difficulty buy: 'Director's Cut' You play as Emo Boy, who bridge over the difficulties to achieve his sacred wishes. Evil grandmas, chavs, security guards, goths, weeaboos and haters appear on his way. But our EmoBoy will never surrender! With help of tears, literally, he smashes his way: plunge your enemies into shock by shooting them with your tears. You need to collect cigarettes in order to replenish your Jetpack stock! Your main companion and mentor is Girl with blue hair. She will not let you get bored and always will help you with advice on any trouble!
